feed.title: Upvote RSS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.0.2
entry.content:
• Change RSS header content type to text/xml with UTF-8 charset
  • Add Reddit domain overrides to feed item guid and comment nodes
  • Reddit domain override fix for galleries
  • Change some environment variable example host domains in the README

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.0.3
entry.content:
• Fix a filesystem cache saving error
  • Make max_execution_time a constant so it can be used elsewhere
  • Allow setting a custom LLM temperature
  • LLM model check in summarizer
  • Summary retries if the few one fails

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.0.4
entry.content:
• Add self-hosting link to the top of the demo site
  • Fix some Docker caching issues ðŸ¤ž
  • Add version to front end

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.0.5
entry.content:
Added some basic logging to make debugging easier

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5

entry.title: New release for Upvote RSS: v1.0.6
entry.content:
Attempt to fix more cache issues

Full Changelog: https://github.com/johnwarne/upvote-rss/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6
